title: [BUG] dry run output is incomplete
description:
Bug Report Checklist

  • Have you provided a full/minimal spec to reproduce the issue?
  • Have you validated the input using an OpenAPI validator (example)?
  • Have you tested with the latest master to confirm the issue still exists? (no, but looked into the code, no changes there)
  • Have you searched for related issues/PRs?
  • What's the actual output vs expected output?
  • [Optional] Sponsorship to speed up the bug fix or feature request (example)
Description

The dry run output is supposed to indicate changes to the generated files but currently it only reports about metadata files.

openapi-generator version

v6.6.0

OpenAPI declaration file content or url

https://gist.github.com/nebulon42/76ab3b59bf820128c04e39770a803228
not really relevent as it happens with every spec

Generation Details

The generator does not matter as this is a core feature. Just add the --dry-run flag in the CLI.

Steps to reproduce

Try to generate code with the CLI with any generator and the --dry-run flag.

Related issues/PRs
Suggest a fix

It looks like that in DryRunTemplateManager.java#L47 the write method only sets the SkippedOverwrite state and omits the rest.

The generator does not matter as this is a core feature. Just add the --dry-run flag in the CLI.
Steps to reproduce

Related issues/PRs
